sentences.english: Fengfeng mine is located in southern Hebei Province, Handan City is one of the major urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 峰峰矿区位于河北省南部，是邯郸市的重要城区之一。

sentences.english: Gushan anticline is the main controlling structure in Fengfeng mine district.
sentences.chinese: 鼓山背斜是峰峰矿区的主控构造。
